name: Doge Inspector
description:
Each dog you inspect is created with the utmost care and attention; however, Management have recently had some trouble with foxes getting past the verification process.

That's where you come in: you have to make sure that every dog is a dog, and not a fox. If you see a fox, make sure you press the red button, and they will be safely and securely removed from the production line by our patented Fox Funnel TM.  Otherwise, you're good to press the green button and send the cute dog on their way to a new owner!

We've provided you a radio with a whopping 5 tracks on it, so you can inspect dogs to whatever music you like most (or in silence, if you want).

(Yes, you may pet the dogs).

Credits:

  • Audio: Tallbeard Studios
  • Dog/Fox model: Omabuarts Studio
  • Programming/other models: Finn (me!) :)
